text: Aleksei Vladimirovich Dudin (; born 13 May 1977) is a former Russian football player. Dudin played in the Russian Premier League with FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC KAMAZ Naberezhnye Chelny players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Rubin Kazan players Category:FC Neftekhimik Nizhnekamsk players
title: Aleksei Dudin
